vb10:1.2_0: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:2.2_0: Idha bhikkhu satimā hoti paramena satinepakkena samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā hoti anussaritā—
vb10:3.1_0: So tathā sato viharanto taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinati pavicarati parivīmaṁsamāpajjati—
vb10:4.1_0: Tassa taṁ dhammaṁ paññāya pavicinato pavicarato parivīmaṁsamāpajjato āraddhaṁ hoti vīriyaṁ asallīnaṁ—
vb10:8.1_0: So tathā samāhitaṁ cittaṁ sādhukaṁ ajjhupekkhitā hoti—
vb10:9.2_0: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:10.2_0: Atthi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu sati, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu sati.
vb10:10.3_0: Yadapi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:10.4_0: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu sati tadapi satisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:11.2_0: Atthi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu pavicayo, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo.
vb10:11.3_0: Yadapi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:11.4_0: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu pavicayo tadapi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:12.2_0: Atthi kāyikaṁ vīriyaṁ, atthi cetasikaṁ vīriyaṁ.
vb10:12.3_0: Yadapi kāyikaṁ vīriyaṁ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:12.4_0: Yadapi cetasikaṁ vīriyaṁ tadapi vīriyasambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:13.2_0: Atthi savitakkasavicārā pīti, atthi avitakkaavicārā pīti.
vb10:13.3_0: Yadapi savitakkasavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:13.4_0: Yadapi avitakkaavicārā pīti tadapi pītisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:14.3_0: Yadapi kāyapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:14.4_0: Yadapi cittapassaddhi tadapi passaddhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:15.2_0: Atthi savitakko savicāro samādhi, atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi.
vb10:15.3_0: Yadapi savitakko savicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:15.4_0: Yadapi avitakko avicāro samādhi tadapi samādhisambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:16.2_0: Atthi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu upekkhā, atthi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā.
vb10:16.3_0: Yadapi ajjhattaṁ dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:16.4_0: Yadapi bahiddhā dhammesu upekkhā tadapi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
vb10:17.2_0: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:18.2_0: Idha bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ,
vb10:18.8_0: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṁ bhāveti vivekanissitaṁ virāganissitaṁ nirodhanissitaṁ vossaggapariṇāmiṁ.
vb10:20.2_0: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:21.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:21.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti—
vb10:22.2_0: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb10:23.2_1: amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb10:24.2_0: Yo cetasiko vīriyārambho …pe… sammāvāyāmo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb10:25.2_0: Yā pīti pāmojjaṁ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṁ attamanatā cittassa pītisambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:26.2_0: Yā vedanākkhandhassa saññākkhandhassa saṅkhārakkhandhassa viññāṇakkhandhassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhi passambhanā paṭippassambhanā paṭippassambhitattaṁ passaddhisambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:27.2_0: Yā cittassa ṭhiti …pe… sammāsamādhi samādhisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb10:28.2_0: Yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:30.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:30.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb10:31.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:31.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:33.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:33.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe…
vb10:33.4_0: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:33.4_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ suññataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye satta bojjhaṅgā honti—
vb10:34.2_0: Yā sati anussati …pe… sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb10:35.2_0: Yā upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:37.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:37.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe…
vb10:37.4_0: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:37.4_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye sati anussati sammāsati satisambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
vb10:38.2_0: Idha bhikkhu yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ diṭṭhigatānaṁ pahānāya paṭhamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:38.2_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe…
vb10:38.4_0: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
vb10:38.4_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ suññataṁ, yā tasmiṁ samaye upekkhā upekkhanā ajjhupekkhanā majjhattatā cittassa upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo—
vb10:40.2_0: satisambojjhaṅgo, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, samādhisambojjhaṅgo, upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
vb10:41.1_0: Sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ kati kusalā, kati akusalā, kati abyākatā …pe… kati saraṇā, kati araṇā?
vb10:43.2_0: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
vb10:47.1_0: Siyā savitakkasavicārā, siyā avitakkavicāramattā, siyā avitakkaavicārā.
vb10:48.1_0: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, sukhasahagato, na upekkhāsahagato;
vb10:48.2_0: cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā upekkhāsahagatā.
vb10:57.1_0: Na maggārammaṇā, siyā maggahetukā, siyā maggādhipatino;
vb10:58.1_0: Siyā uppannā, siyā anuppannā, siyā uppādino.
vb10:59.1_0: Siyā atītā, siyā anāgatā, siyā paccuppannā.
vb10:61.1_0: Siyā ajjhattā, siyā bahiddhā, siyā ajjhattabahiddhā.
vb10:64.2_0: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva sahetuko ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva sahetukā cā”ti, sahetukā ceva na ca hetū.
vb10:64.3_0: Dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca, cha bojjhaṅgā na vattabbā “hetū ceva hetusampayuttā cā”ti, hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū.
vb10:64.4_0: Cha bojjhaṅgā na hetū sahetukā, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo na vattabbo “na hetusahetuko”tipi, “na hetuahetuko”tipi.
vb10:66.4_0: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva sāsavā cā”tipi, sāsavā ceva no ca āsavātipi.
vb10:66.5_0: Na vattabbā “āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā cā”tipi, “āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā”tipi.
vb10:70.1_0: Pītisambojjhaṅgo appītiko, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sappītikā, siyā appītikā.
vb10:70.2_0: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na pītisahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā pītisahagatā, siyā na pītisahagatā.
vb10:70.3_0: Pītisambojjhaṅgo sukhasahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā sukhasahagatā, siyā na sukhasahagatā.
vb10:70.4_0: Pītisambojjhaṅgo na upekkhāsahagato, cha bojjhaṅgā siyā upekkhāsahagatā, siyā na upekkhāsahagatā.
